00021 template <class T>
00022 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00023 template <class T, typename X>
00024 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x);
00025 template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00026 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y);
00027 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00028 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z);
00029 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00030 shared_ptr<T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz);
00031 
00032 #define XNODE_OBJECT  template <class _T> \
00033     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime); \
00034     template <class _T, typename _X> \
00035     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x); \
00036     template <class _T, typename _X, typename _Y> \
00037     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x, _Y y); \
00038     template <class _T, typename _X, typename _Y, typename _Z> \
00039     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x, _Y y, _Z z); \
00040     template <class _T, typename _X, typename _Y, typename _Z, typename _ZZ> \
00041     friend shared_ptr<_T> createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, _X x, _Y y, _Z z, _ZZ zz);
00042 
00043 //! XNode supports load/save for scripts/GUI, and signaling among threads.
00044 //! \sa create(), createOrphan()
00045 class XNode : public enable_shared_from_this<XNode>
00046 #ifdef HAVE_LIBGCCPP
00047 , public kame_gc
00048 #endif
00049 {
00050     //! Use XNODE_OBJECT macro in sub-classes.
00051     XNODE_OBJECT
00052 protected:
00053     explicit XNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00054 public:
00055     virtual ~XNode();  
00056 
00057     template <class T>
00058     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00059     template <class T, typename X>
00060     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x);
00061     template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00062     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y);
00063     template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00064     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z);
00065     template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00066     shared_ptr<T> create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz);
00067 
00068     //! \return internal/script name. Use latin1 chars.
00069     std::string getName() const;
00070     //! \return i18n name for UI.
00071     virtual std::string getLabel() const {return getName();}
00072     std::string getTypename() const;
00073 
00074     shared_ptr<XNode> getChild(const std::string &var) const;
00075     shared_ptr<XNode> getParent() const;
00076 
00077     typedef std::deque<shared_ptr<XNode> > NodeList;
00078     //! \return null if node has no child.
00079     atomic_shared_ptr<const NodeList> children() const {return m_children;}
00080 
00081     void clearChildren();
00082     int releaseChild(const shared_ptr<XNode> &node);
00083 
00084     bool isRunTime() const {return m_flags & FLAG_RUNTIME;}
00085 
00086     //! If true, operation allowed by GUI
00087     //! \sa SetUIEnabled()
00088     bool isUIEnabled() const {return m_flags & FLAG_UI_ENABLED;}
00089     //! Enable/Disable control over GUI
00090     void setUIEnabled(bool v);
00091     //! Disable all operations on this node forever.
00092     void disable();
00093     //! Touch signaling
00094     void touch();
00095 
00096     //! After touching
00097     //! \sa touch()
00098     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > &onTouch() {return m_tlkOnTouch;}
00099     //! If true, operation allowed by GUI
00100     //! \sa setUIEnabled
00101     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > &onUIEnabled() {return m_tlkOnUIEnabled;}
00102 
00103     virtual void insert(const shared_ptr<XNode> &ptr);
00104 protected: 
00105     //! If false, all operations have to be disabled. 
00106     bool isEnabled() const {return m_flags & FLAG_ENABLED;}
00107 
00108     atomic_shared_ptr<NodeList> m_children;
00109 
00110     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > m_tlkOnTouch;
00111     XTalker<shared_ptr<XNode> > m_tlkOnUIEnabled;
00112 private:
00113     const std::string m_name;
00114     enum {FLAG_RUNTIME = 0x1, FLAG_ENABLED = 0x2, FLAG_UI_ENABLED = 0x4};
00115     int m_flags;
00116 
00117     static XThreadLocal<NodeList> stl_thisCreating;
00118     weak_ptr<XNode> m_parent;
00119 };

00121 //! Base class containing values
00122 class XValueNodeBase : public XNode
00123 {
00124     XNODE_OBJECT
00125 protected:
00126     explicit XValueNodeBase(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00127 public:
00128     //! Get value as a string, which is used as XML meta data.
00129     virtual std::string to_str() const = 0;
00130     //! Set value as a string, which is used as XML meta data.
00131     //! throw exception when validator throws.
00132     void str(const QString &str) throw (XKameError &);
00133     void str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &);
00134 
00135     typedef void (*Validator)(std::string &);
00136     //! validator can throw \a XKameError, if it detects conversion errors.
00137     //! never insert when str() may be called.
00138     void setValidator(Validator);
00139 
00140     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > &beforeValueChanged()
00141     {return m_tlkBeforeValueChanged;}
00142     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > &onValueChanged() 
00143     {return m_tlkOnValueChanged;}
00144 protected:
00145     virtual void _str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &) = 0;
00146 
00147     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > m_tlkBeforeValueChanged;
00148     XTalker<shared_ptr<XValueNodeBase> > m_tlkOnValueChanged;
00149     Validator m_validator;
00150 };

00152 class XDoubleNode : public XValueNodeBase
00153 {
00154     XNODE_OBJECT
00155 protected:
00156     explicit XDoubleNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false, const char *format = 0L);
00157 public:
00158     virtual ~XDoubleNode() {}
00159     virtual std::string to_str() const;
00160     virtual void value(const double &t);
00161     virtual operator double() const;
00162     const char *format() const;
00163     void setFormat(const char* format);
00164 protected:
00165     virtual void _str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &);
00166 private:
00167     atomic<double> m_var;
00168     std::string m_format;
00169     XRecursiveMutex m_valuemutex;
00170 };

00172 class XStringNode : public XValueNodeBase
00173 {
00174     XNODE_OBJECT
00175 protected:
00176     explicit XStringNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false);
00177 public:
00178     virtual ~XStringNode() {}
00179     virtual std::string to_str() const;
00180     virtual operator std::string() const;
00181     void operator=(const std::string &str);
00182     virtual void value(const std::string &t);
00183 protected:
00184     virtual void _str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &);
00185 private:
00186     atomic<std::string> m_var;
00187     XRecursiveMutex m_valuemutex;

00190 //! Base class for value node.
00191 template <typename T, int base = 10>
00192 class XValueNode : public XValueNodeBase
00193 {
00194     XNODE_OBJECT
00195 protected:
00196     explicit XValueNode(const char *name, bool runtime = false)
00197     : XValueNodeBase(name, runtime), m_var(0) {}
00198 public:
00199     virtual ~XValueNode() {}
00200     virtual operator T() const {return m_var;}
00201     virtual std::string to_str() const;
00202     virtual void value(const T &t);
00203 protected:
00204     virtual void _str(const std::string &str) throw (XKameError &);
00205     atomic<T> m_var;
00206     XRecursiveMutex m_valuemutex;
00207 private:
00208 };

00210 typedef XValueNode<int> XIntNode;
00211 typedef XValueNode<unsigned int> XUIntNode;
00212 typedef XValueNode<bool> XBoolNode;
00213 typedef XValueNode<unsigned int, 16> XHexNode;

00215 template <class T>
00216 shared_ptr<T>
00217 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime)
00218 {
00219     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime));
00220     insert(ptr);
00221     return ptr;
00222 }
00223 template <class T, typename X>
00224 shared_ptr<T>
00225 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x)
00226 {
00227     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x));
00228     insert(ptr);
00229     return ptr;
00230 }
00231 template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00232 shared_ptr<T>
00233 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y)
00234 {
00235     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x, y));
00236     insert(ptr);
00237     return ptr;
00238 }
00239 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00240 shared_ptr<T>
00241 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z)
00242 {
00243     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x, y, z));
00244     insert(ptr);
00245     return ptr;
00246 }
00247 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00248 shared_ptr<T>
00249 XNode::create(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz)
00250 {
00251     shared_ptr<T> ptr(createOrphan<T>(name, runtime, x, y, z, zz));
00252     insert(ptr);
00253     return ptr;
00254 }
00255 
00256 template <class T>
00257 shared_ptr<T>
00258 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime)
00259 {
00260     new T(name, runtime);
00261     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00262     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00263     return ptr;
00264 }
00265 template <class T, typename X>
00266 shared_ptr<T>
00267 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x)
00268 {
00269     new T(name, runtime, x);
00270     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00271     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00272     return ptr;
00273 }
00274 template <class T, typename X, typename Y>
00275 shared_ptr<T>
00276 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y)
00277 {
00278     new T(name, runtime, x, y);
00279     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00280     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00281     return ptr;
00282 }
00283 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z>
00284 shared_ptr<T>
00285 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z)
00286 {
00287     new T(name, runtime, x, y, z);
00288     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00289     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00290     return ptr;
00291 }
00292 template <class T, typename X, typename Y, typename Z, typename ZZ>
00293 shared_ptr<T>
00294 createOrphan(const char *name, bool runtime, X x, Y y, Z z, ZZ zz)
00295 {
00296     new T(name, runtime, x, y, z, zz);
00297     shared_ptr<T> ptr = dynamic_pointer_cast<T>(XNode::stl_thisCreating->back());
00298     XNode::stl_thisCreating->pop_back();
00299     return ptr;
00300 }
